fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • In an article about the damming of the Colorado River in the US, we misnamed Nancy Saldaña, an architect and activist in San Luis Río Colorado, Mexico, as “Nancy Saldano” (Across the border in Mexico, the river runs dry, 22 October, page 28). • Other recently corrected articles include: UK government considered repatriation of British Isis members Mexico’s Day of the Dead festival rises from the graveyard and into pop culture
